login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access the application
login.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
login.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
login.configError: Authentication is not configured. Please provide authConfig with onLogin handler in AppShell props.

files.title: Files
files.subtitle: Manage and browse your files here.
files.noSettings: Settings not loaded or unsupported algorithm.
files.notReadableError: The selected file can't be read. It may be locked by another app, removed, or access was revoked. Close any app using the file, copy it to a writable folder, and choose it again.
